lyrics.tlyric: 宝贝
哇哦……
哇哦……
哇哦……

lyrics.lyric: You know you love me, I know you care
lyrics.tlyric: 你知道你爱我 我知道你在意的

lyrics.lyric: Just shout whenever, and I'll be there
lyrics.tlyric: 无论何时 只要你呼叫 我就会（出现）在那里

lyrics.lyric: You want my love, you want my heart
lyrics.tlyric: （我感觉）你想要我的爱和我的心

lyrics.lyric: And we will never ever ever be apart
lyrics.tlyric: 我们也永远不会被拆散

lyrics.lyric: Are we an item? Girl quit playing
lyrics.tlyric: 我们是一对吗？女孩退出游戏（爱情）了

lyrics.lyric: We're just friends, what are you saying
lyrics.tlyric: 你在说什么？！我们只是朋友？

lyrics.lyric: Said there's another and look right in my eyes
lyrics.tlyric: 直视我的眼睛 所以有另一个人？！（出现在我们的世界）

lyrics.lyric: My first love broke my heart for the first time
lyrics.tlyric: 我的初恋就这样第一次伤了我的心
我说
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝

lyrics.lyric: I thought you'd always been mine, mine
lyrics.tlyric: 我以为你会永远都会是我的
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝

lyrics.lyric: I thought you'd always been mine, mine
lyrics.tlyric: 我以为你会永远都会是我的

lyrics.lyric: For you, I would have done whatever
lyrics.tlyric: 为了你 我愿意做任何事

lyrics.lyric: And I just can't believe we ain't together
lyrics.tlyric: 我无法相信我们没有在一起

lyrics.lyric: And I wanna play it cool, but I'm losing you
lyrics.tlyric: 我想用酷酷的方式谈恋爱 但我正在失去你

lyrics.lyric: I'll buy you anything, I'll buy you any ring
lyrics.tlyric: 我会给你买任何东西 我会给你买任何（你喜欢的）戒指

lyrics.lyric: And I'm in pieces, baby fix me
lyrics.tlyric: 我支离破碎了 宝贝（用你的爱）修复我

lyrics.lyric: And you'll shake me till you wake me from this bad dream
lyrics.tlyric: 你会（一直）推我直到把我从噩梦中摇醒

lyrics.lyric: I'm going down, down, down, down
lyrics.tlyric: 我摇摇欲坠

lyrics.lyric: And I just can't believe my first love won't be around
lyrics.tlyric: 不能相信我的初恋（就这样）无疾而终
我现在已经习惯
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝

lyrics.tlyric: 我以为你会永远都会是我的

宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
宝贝 宝贝 宝贝

lyrics.lyric: I thought you'd always been mine, mine
lyrics.tlyric: 我以为你会永远都会是我的

lyrics.lyric: When I was 13 I had my first love
lyrics.tlyric: 我在十三岁的时候 有了自己的初恋

lyrics.lyric: There was nobody that compared to my baby
lyrics.tlyric: 就此没人可以和我的爱人（宝贝）相提并论

lyrics.lyric: And nobody came between us or could ever come above
lyrics.tlyric: 没人可以介入我们之间或凌驾于（这份感情）之上
她让我几近疯狂
（弄的）我像一个追星族一样

lyrics.lyric: She woke me up daily don't need no starbucks
lyrics.tlyric: 她让我的思维清醒就像我每天不能没有星巴克咖啡
她让我心跳加速

lyrics.lyric: Asking for a beat when I see her in the street
lyrics.tlyric: 当我在街头看见她 请给我猛烈的打击

lyrics.lyric: And at school on the playground
lyrics.tlyric: 也包括在学校的操场上

lyrics.lyric: But I really wanna see her on the weekend
lyrics.tlyric: 但我真的（还）想在周末看见她

lyrics.lyric: She knows she got me daze
lyrics.tlyric: 她（也应该)知道她让我精神恍恍惚惚
因为她是那样为爱疯狂

lyrics.lyric: And now my heart is breaking
lyrics.tlyric: 现在我的心也被伤透了

lyrics.lyric: But I'll just keep on saying
lyrics.tlyric: 但我只是想继续说（那句）

[00:45.310]Baby, baby, baby, oh like
[00:49.000]Baby, baby, baby, no like
[00:52.660]Baby, baby, baby, oh

[01:03.860]Baby, baby, baby, no like
[01:07.480]Baby, baby, baby, oh

[01:28.990]And I'm in pieces, baby fix me
[01:32.870]And you'll shake me till you wake me from this bad dream
[01:36.370]
[01:36.940]I'm going down, down, down, down
[01:40.260]And I just can't believe my first love won't be around
[01:43.920]And I'm now like
[01:44.350]Baby, baby, baby, oh like
[01:48.040]Baby, baby, baby, no like
[01:51.760]Baby, baby, baby, oh
[01:55.500]I thought you'd always been mine, mine
[01:59.170]Baby, baby, baby, oh like
[02:02.890]Baby, baby, baby, no like
[02:06.540]Baby, baby, baby, oh
[02:10.220]I thought you'd always been mine, mine
[02:14.470]When I was 13 I had my first love
[02:18.010]There was nobody that compared to my baby
[02:19.420]And nobody came between us or could ever come above
[02:21.540]She had me going crazy
[02:23.680]Oh I was starstruck
[02:25.450]She woke me up daily don't need no starbucks
[02:29.250]She made my heart pound
[02:30.920]Asking for a beat when I see her in the street
[02:32.400]And at school on the playground
[02:34.690]But I really wanna see her on the weekend
[02:36.480]She knows she got me dazy
[02:38.500]Cause she was so amazing
[02:40.250]And now my heart is breaking
[02:42.140]But I'll just keep on saying
[02:43.730]Baby, baby, baby, oh like
[02:47.150]Baby, baby, baby, no like
[02:50.970]Baby, baby, baby, oh
[02:54.550]I thought you'd always been mine, mine
[02:58.360]Baby, baby, baby, oh like
[03:02.050]Baby, baby, baby, no like
[03:05.690]Baby, baby, baby, oh
[03:09.010]

[03:12.000]Now I'm all gone
[03:15.730]Now I'm all gone
[03:19.350]Now I'm all gone
[03:23.010]Now I'm all gone
[03:26.910]I am gone
[03:28.360]

[00:22.670]（我感觉）你想要我的爱和我的心
[00:26.290]我们也永远不会被拆散
[00:29.980]我们是一体的吗？女孩 停止游戏（爱情）了

[01:11.170]我以为你会永远都会是我的
[01:14.780]为了你 我愿意做任何事
[01:18.230]（再）给我另一个机会 我们（也许）会再在一起的
[01:21.770]我想用酷酷的方式谈恋爱 也包括失去你
[01:25.580]我会给你买任何东西 我会给你买任何（你喜欢的）戒指
[01:28.990]我支离破碎了 宝贝（用你的爱）修复我

[02:14.470]我在十三岁的时候 有了自己的初恋
[02:18.010]就此没人可以和我的爱人（宝贝）相提并论
[02:19.420]没人可以介入我们之间或凌驾于（这份感情）之上
[02:21.540]她让我几近疯狂
[02:23.680]（弄的）我像一个追星族一样
[02:25.450]她让我的思维清醒就像我每天不能没有星巴克咖啡（时时刻刻离不开她）
[02:29.250]她让我心跳加速
[02:30.920]当我在街头看见她 请给我猛烈的打击（叫我不要想他）
[02:32.400]（也包括）在学校的操场上
[02:34.690]但我真的（还）想在周末看见她
